        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change the type of column "name" and "value" for table "pwd_verification_param" from "translated_text" to "string". 
Fix for PRB1184610.</description>
        <name>Update dictionary type for param</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[updateColumnType("name");
updateColumnType("value");
function updateColumnType(columnName) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    gr.addQuery("name", "pwd_verification_param");
    gr.addQuery("internal_type", "translated_text");
    gr.addQuery("element", columnName);
    gr.setWorkflow(false);
    gr.query();

    if(gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue("internal_type", "string");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
